resources.string: Click on a element to start!
Do operations combined with saving elements. E.g., sharing, compressing, resizing, applying scripts or searching on Google.
Opens a window where you can share the chosen elements with other people or applications!
Here you can apply premade or custom scripts to elements! (Scripts configuration is found in Options or by pressing the wrench)
Here you can use the elements you chose to create a search query on Google!
